tha-ap510:0.3_0: Hearing the fruit of the senior monks,
tha-ap510:1.4_0: And the simile of the fruit,
tha-ap510:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap510:2.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap510:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap510:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap510:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nimitta.
tha-ap510:7.1_0: Eight senior monks have plunged into the junior ones.
